text: La k steqsayen ma ad yili umennu$ deg waggur ioqan. Ini: "amennu$ degs, d abekkav. Abekkav it i$elben, ar Oebbi, d assefoe$ $ef ubrid n Oebbi, d ankao is, u d ankao n Loamaa n Leaoam; d assuffe$, segs, imezda$ is". Ahewwel i$leb amennu$. Zgan a kwen pna$en, alamma swexxoen kwen, ma zemren, si ddin nnwen. Win, segwen, iff$en i ddin is, ad immet d ajehli. Widak, mean igiten nnsen di ddunit, di laxeot. Widak, d at tmes, degs, nitni, ad wekkoen
